title: Reuters exclusively reports key details of Trump’s Truth Social ahead of the launch; market reacts
dc:creator: Erica Ascher
description:
Reuters broke news over the weekend on the launch of Donald Trump’s new social media venture, Truth Social. Reuters exclusively […]

The post Reuters exclusively reports key details of Trump’s Truth Social ahead of the launch; market reacts appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters broke news over the weekend on the launch of Donald Trump’s new social media venture, Truth Social. Reuters exclusively reported key details on how the app works and what wasn’t working a week before the launch. The reporting, based on beta testers of the app invited to the service a week before the launch, gave readers an exclusive glimpse at the closely scrutinized project from the former U.S. president. Reuters had previously reported the launch date even as executives said publicly it would not launch until much later. 

The post Reuters exclusively reports key details of Trump’s Truth Social ahead of the launch; market reacts appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
